set.name: Karen Walker "Mujer" Resort 2016-2017 collection
set.description:
Karen Walker produced 900 bags in Kenya as part for its Autumn-Winter 2017 collection.

A total of 132 artisans were involved in producing the order, part of four different community groups: Artisan.Fashion, the Rangau Self-Helf Group, The O's Self Help Group and Mahali Pa Watoto.

53% of the artisans working on the order were women and 91% of the artisans were under the age of 40. Nearly all artisans received some form of training to help with the production of the order.

80% of the artisans used income received to fund the education of their children, dependents or their own.

The different skills required to produce the order were: Stitching, brass casting, screen-printing, embroidery, pom-pom making, horn-carving, supervision, preparation, packing and finishing.

things.name: Artisan.Fashion
things.address: EPZ, Athi River, MachakoEPZ Road, Athi River, Machakos County, Kenya
things.description:
Artisan.Fashion is a social enterprise that was established in 2005 to connect Africaâ€™s artisans to esteemed luxury brands all over the world. 

They are the first African production company to successfully combine artisan creativity and production capability with a careful consideration for traceable social impact. Acting both as a production hub and a disseminator of work, they employ Kenyan artisans in their hub and collaborate with 17 artisan communities across Kenya to produce hand crafted materials and artifacts made with traditional skills.

To find out more visit: http://artisan.fashion

ARTISAN TESTIMONIAL

Martha Kimani:

"I am a single mother of three. I worked on the Karen Walker Resort 2016-2017 order as a supervisor to machine operators. The order came at a time when my daughter has been involved in a discipline case in secondary school with other girls. They were fined a huge amount of money as a condition for readmission into their final year in school. I used the income from the order to meet the fine."

Asumpta Kanini:

 "I am a mother of five. I worked on the Karen Walker Resort 2016-2017 order as an embroiderer at Artisan.Fashion. I received good income which I used to pay rent, school fees, food and other household utilities."

things.name: The O's Self Help Group to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
The O's Self Help Group
things.description:
The O's Self Help Group is a horn and bone carving workshop.

For the Karen Walker order, they made 950 units of arrow-shaped horn zips.

things.name: Mahali pa Watoto to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Cow horn crafts SHG to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Mahali pa Watoto
things.description:
Mahali Pa Watoto is a group of young mothers who have come together, pooling their resources with the goal of ensuring a better future for their children. Indeed, Mahali Pa Watoto means  "a place for children" in Swahili.

For the Karen Walker order, the Mahali Pa Watoto group made 2850 units of pom poms for the Mujer collection.

ARTISAN TESTIMONIAL

Eunice Achien'g:

"I am a mother of two. I worked on the pompoms during the Karen Walker "Mujer" Resort 2016-2017 order. During the order my child was sick, so I used to report late for work. Even with the sickness of my child I still earned good income from the order which I used to pay medical bills and to offer healthy nutrition to my family. I was happy to have work."

things.name: Meera Smart Wear
things.address: Meera Smart Wear, Ronald Ngala Street, Nairobi
things.description: Nylon and Poly cotton sewing thread was purchased from Meera Smart Wear for the Karen Walker order.

things.name: Sagana Tanneries Ltd to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Rangau Self Help Group to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Freemans K LTD to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Rangau Self Help Group
things.address: Africa Nazarene University, Magadi Road, Ongata Rongai, Kenya
things.description:
The Rangau Self-Help Group is a brass workshop run by husband and wife duo, Anton and Benta.

The workshop recycles scrap metals to make the brass pieces (locks, engine parts, valves etc.)

For the Karen Walker order, the Rangau Self Help Group made 310 brass bells, 2850 brass rings and 310 brass parrot clips.

things.name: Thika Clothe Mill Ltd to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Sagana Tanneries Ltd
things.description: Vegetable leather was sourced from Sagana Tanneries to produce handles for one of the Karen Walker bag styles.

things.name: Cow horn crafts SHG
things.address: Kiambu Institute Of Technology, Kiambu Road, Kiambu
things.description:
Kenyan group of horn carvers. These skilled young men started out on the streets, many recovering alcholics, and have taken control of their life through work.

ARTISAN TESTIMONIAL:

Edward Macharia

 "I am married with five dependents. I worked on the Karen Walker "Mujer" Resort 2016-2017 order making horn zips. The order was so exciting and easy as I am used to more complex horn work. I received good income which I used to pay the third term of school fees for all my children."

things.name: Freemans K LTD
things.description:
Acrylic fibers are a synthetic fiber made from a polymer (polyacrylonitrile).

Acrylic Yarn was purchased from Freemans K Ltd to make 2850 pompoms for the Karen Walker order.

things.name: Meera Smart Wear to Artisans.Fashion EPZ Ltd
Inkson
things.address: Inkson Industrial Co Ltd, Ground Floor, Building 7, Dunga Road, Nairobi
things.description: Water based paste was purchased from Desbro Kenya for the screen-printing of the Karen Walker "Mujer" design on the bags. The print is decorative and also helped support embroidery work.

things.name: Thika Cloth Mill Ltd
things.description: Cotton canvas sourced from Thika Clothe Mill (http://thikaclothmills.com) was used as a base fabric to construct the Karen Walker "Mujer" Autumn-Winter 2017 collection.

things.name: Karen Walker
things.address: 10 Maidstone St, Grey Lynn, Auckland 1021, New Zealand

google_places.name: 10 Maidstone St

things.description: Upon completion, the  300 tote bags, pouches and keyrings for the Resort 2016-2017 "Mujer" collection were shipped to Karen Walker's head office for them to deliver to their various retail stores. The bags can also be purchased from their e-commerce store online.
